title: Calories in a Corn Dog
meta_description: Discover calories in a corn dog, including full nutrition breakdown like carbs, protein, fat, sodium, and easy tweaks for variations.
assumptions: Standard frozen corn dog, battered with cornmeal, deep-fried, ~120 g total weight including beef/pork hot dog.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, size, hot dog type, batter recipe, and frying method. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A standard corn dog provides ~290 kcal, with notable carbs from the batter and protein from the hot dog.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Use turkey hot dog instead of beef/pork

faqs.q: How many calories in a corn dog?
faqs.a: About 290 kcal for a standard 120 g frozen corn dog.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a corn dog?
faqs.a: Roughly 35 g carbs, mostly from the cornmeal batter.

faqs.q: Is a corn dog high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 800 mg sodium due to the hot dog and batter seasoning.

faqs.q: How much protein in one corn dog?
faqs.a: Approximately 10 g protein from the hot dog filling.

faqs.q: Can I make a lower-calorie corn dog?
faqs.a: Yes, opt for baking or air-frying to cut ~100 kcal, or use a leaner hot dog.
